name: Reconsider Inertia
desc: Move in the direction you face.
short: Move in the direction you face.

name: Ether-networked
desc:
This ship requires an Ether-networked officer for full performance.

The unparalleled responsiveness and maneuverability of Telos ships stems from a heavy reliance on a mind-ship connection. Manual controls are available, but are intended for emergencies, not combat.

name: # Damaged
desc: This ship has been damaged and there is no time to repair it.
